explains: n. 隐居；与世隔绝的地方

sentences.en: In spite of the extremity of her seclusion she was sane.
sentences.cn: 尽管完全与世隔绝，她依然神智清醒。

sentences.en: We are now in rural seclusion.
sentences.cn: 我们目前过着乡村隐居生活。

sentences.en: Her extended seclusion generated considerable public criticism.
sentences.cn: 她长时间的“与世隔绝”引起了相当多的公众非议。
